data.text: @jeremygoepel @JoeBorelliNYC I’ve said the exact same thing

@KickTheDustUpK @JoeBorelliNYC They stalked the mayor of Boston everyday. Set up outside her house and made her life miserable. That’s how they broke her. I’ve been saying for months this is what we need to do. In his face at every moment till he breaks
@JoeBorelliNYC Set up a meeting somewhere and let’s make this happen. Boston made it happen, so can we. We haven’t fought back hard enough. Walking across the Brooklyn Bridge with signs isn’t action.
@JoeBorelliNYC Did you see the fda and Pfizer docs with 9 pages of adverse events?  And now the likes of Williams wants this crap injected in babies!?

@JoeBorelliNYC I hope so. The fact that I can go anywhere in the city unvaxxed except my job is bogus. Not to mention I have a LEGIT medical reason, but the form doesn’t account for that. The only permanent exemptions allowed doesn’t cover actual medical conditions. It’s insanity.
@JoeBorelliNYC But @JoeBorelliNYC if only they had just complied. Hmmmmmmmmm where have I heard that!?
@JoeBorelliNYC Whats going on with the lawsuit you were filing?

@JoeBorelliNYC If you actually worked HALF of the time that you spend talking shit on twitter, that would be something.. But you tweet even while overseeing hearings.. So really Joe what do you actually do other than fleece folks for a paycheck?

@JoeBorelliNYC Of course, because actually doing your job is too much for you. You could have held an oversight hearing but that would have actually meant that you had to do something. 17 people are dead due to you being a lazy POS.
